name: Balloon Hero - Endless Adventure Game
description:
Balloon Hero is a brand new platformer game!
This time, our little hero is trying to conquer the ocean!
Running on the road, Jumping among balloons and avoiding monsters!
How far can you go?

HOW TO PLAY
- Tap screen to jump
- Tap screen in the sky to double jump
- Hold to long jump


GAME FEATURES
- Easy to learn, Fun to master
- Amazing graphics design
- Tons of cute characters to unlock
- Watch out! It's really addictive
